name: gib-meble
description: * Includes Bootstrap SCSS files   * I was tired of overwriting bootstrap classes over and over again making my css file longer * Modified Menu Walker for my own workflow   * I didn't like the default WordPress menu classes so I removed all of them   * Not many of my clients liked the default Bootstrap mobile menu so I decided to stop using it and wrote more modern approach * Separated scripts and styles including hooks so they are easier to find.
